Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're extending this exclusive opportunity at a special introductory price of $120. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible experience while ensuring you receive significant savings compared to the market value of $150. We're confident it will meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
